ItemDesc: Upon use, decreases Fire DMG taken by all allies by <unbreak>16%</unbreak> and increases Max HP of all allies by <unbreak>20%</unbreak> for the next battle.
ItemBGDesc: The iron bucket contains all sorts of Belobog delicacies as a stew, and is simmered thoroughly using low heat. Ingredients with outlandish appearances float in the soup, but it smells very delicious. "What's wrong if they were once specimens? Aren't they dead animals and plants anyways?"
